description.long: PAYTR, is a service which provides the website owners to get secured online payments from the websites in a fast and simple way with the help of PCI-DSS Level 1 Service Provider adapted technical infrastructure and experienced staff and also has the licence of the Central Bank of Turkish Republic. PayTR provides both the store’s payment security and the customer's card security with its PCI-DSS Level 1 Service Provider adapted technical infrastructure by its experienced staff.
